messages.content: Please upload the PDF file for the deck. Once uploaded, the process will continue.

slides.title: Advanced Wellness Plus Insurance Overview
slides.content: The slide features a promotional image for Advanced Wellness Plus, highlighting a healthcare interaction between a medical professional and an elderly patient. The branding includes a logo and the name 'Advanced Wellness Plus.' The slide also mentions American Financial Security Life Insurance Co., indicating that the limited benefit health insurance plans are underwritten by this company. It references specific policy forms and their issuance to the National Congress of Employers.

slides.title: Advanced Wellness Plus Benefits Overview
slides.content: The slide provides a detailed breakdown of the benefits offered under the 'Advanced Wellness Plus' plan, categorized by different coverage levels (100A, 100, 200, 200+, 300, 500, 750, 1000). It includes various benefits such as Hospital Confinement, Primary and Specialty Care Doctors Office Visits, Emergency Room, Basic Pathology & Radiology, Advance Studies, Surgery, Anesthesia, Mental Health (Inpatient and Outpatient), Supplemental Accident (Inpatient Admission and Emergency Room), Hospital Intensive Care Unit, Additional Hospital Admission, Accidental Death, and Critical Illness. Each benefit is detailed with per day or per admission amounts and maximum days covered. Notably, benefits vary significantly across different coverage levels, with higher levels offering more extensive coverage. Additional notes mention exclusions for pre-existing conditions for 12 months and a 30-day waiting period post-coverage effective date.

slides.title: Overview of Advanced Wellness Plus and NCE Membership
slides.content: The slide provides an overview of the National Congress of Employers (NCE), a national association for small and medium-sized businesses in the U.S., offering networking, advocacy, and information sharing. It highlights the benefits of NCE membership, including valuable services and superior customer service. Upon successful application and payment, members receive a Purchase Confirmation email with the NCE Membership Handbook and insurance certificate. Fulfillment packets are mailed within 7-10 business days. The slide also explains the monthly membership billing process, including a non-refundable enrollment fee and the availability of credit card and bank automatic draft options. It describes Limited Medical Coverage as a plan that supplements major medical plans, providing basic insurance coverage with specific caps. Eligibility is for adult members aged 18-65 and dependent children aged 1-25.

slides.title: Advanced Wellness Plus - GapAfford Plus NCE Membership Benefits
slides.content: The slide outlines the benefits of the GapAfford Plus program, which offers savings on medical expenses without deductibles, pre-existing condition limitations, or age restrictions. It includes a prescription discount benefit with savings on brand-name and generic medications, and access to the Aetna Dental Access Network for dental services. The OUTLOOK Vision Network provides discounts on eyewear and eye care services. Pet Rx offers savings on pet medications. Alternative medicine, chiropractic care, and hearing savings programs are available, along with imaging savings and medical bill negotiations. Members can save on medical supplies, laboratory services, physical therapy, vitamins, and supplements. The program also offers a 24/7 Health Information Line and Nurse Help Line. The benefits are not insurance and are not available in certain states.

slides.title: Hospital Indemnity Insurance Limitations & Exclusions
slides.content: The slide outlines the limitations and exclusions of a hospital indemnity insurance policy. It specifies that benefits will not be provided for treatments, services, or supplies that are not medically necessary, not prescribed by a doctor, experimental, or provided by an immediate family member. Additional exclusions include dental procedures, elective and cosmetic surgeries, felonies or illegal occupations, manipulations of the musculoskeletal system, self-inflicted injuries, war-related injuries, work-related injuries, and pre-existing conditions. There is a 30-day waiting period for sickness benefits, and no coverage for voluntary abortion unless life-threatening. Coverage provisions are briefly described, and claims can be mailed or submitted electronically to the specified addresses.

processed_summaries:
## Plan Overview

### Advanced Wellness Plus Insurance Overview
Advanced Wellness Plus Insurance is a comprehensive health plan designed to provide a variety of benefits and coverage options for individuals seeking to enhance their health and wellness. Underwritten by American Financial Security Life Insurance Co., these limited benefit health insurance plans are structured to meet diverse needs. The plan is associated with the National Congress of Employers (NCE), aimed at supporting small and medium-sized businesses with valuable services, advocacy, and networking opportunities.

## Core Plan Elements

### Key Features and Benefits
- Diverse coverage levels to suit different healthcare needs and budgets.
- Access to a wide range of health services including hospital confinement, doctor visits, emergency care, and more.
- Additional benefits such as mental health support, surgical coverage, and supplemental accident insurance.

### Coverage Details
- Benefits categorized by plan tiers (100A, 100, 200, 200+, 300, 500, 750, 1000) with varying coverage amounts.
- Coverage includes hospital stays, outpatient visits, emergency services, and more, each with specific maximum days and per-day benefits.

### Eligibility Requirements
- Available to adult members aged 18-65 and dependent children aged 1-25.
- Membership in the National Congress of Employers is required, with a non-refundable enrollment fee and monthly billing.

## Common Service Features

### Network Access
- Access to a broad network of healthcare providers for various services including dental and vision care through affiliated programs.

### Claims Process
- Easy claims submission via mail or electronic methods, ensuring efficient processing and reimbursement.

### Support Services
- 24/7 Health Information Line and Nurse Help Line for immediate health advice and support.
- Additional services for medical bill negotiations and discounts on various healthcare-related expenses.

## Plan Tiers and Benefits

### Plan 100A

**Hospital Confinement Benefit**
- Per Day: $100
- Max Days: 30

**Primary Care Doctors Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 3

**Specialty Care Doctors' Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 3

**Accidental Death Benefit**
- Maximum Benefit: Not covered

**Critical Illness**
- Maximum Benefit: Not covered

### Plan 100

**Hospital Confinement Benefit**
- Per Day: $100
- Max Days: 30

**Primary Care Doctors Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Specialty Care Doctors' Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Emergency Room Benefit**
- Per Day: Not covered
- Max Days: 1

**Accidental Death Benefit**
- Maximum Benefit: $10,000

**Critical Illness**
- Maximum Benefit: $1,000

### Plan 200

**Hospital Confinement Benefit**
- Per Day: $200
- Max Days: 30

**Primary Care Doctors Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Specialty Care Doctors' Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Emergency Room Benefit**
- Per Day: Not covered
- Max Days: 1

**Basic Pathology & Radiology Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 1

**Accidental Death Benefit**
- Maximum Benefit: $10,000

**Critical Illness**
- Maximum Benefit: $1,000

### Plan 200+

**Hospital Confinement Benefit**
- Per Day: $200
- Max Days: 30

**Primary Care Doctors Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Specialty Care Doctors' Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Emergency Room Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 2

**Basic Pathology & Radiology Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 3

**Accidental Death Benefit**
- Maximum Benefit: $10,000

**Critical Illness**
- Maximum Benefit: $1,000

### Plan 300

**Hospital Confinement Benefit**
- Per Day: $300
- Max Days: 30

**Primary Care Doctors Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Specialty Care Doctors' Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Emergency Room Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 1

**Mental Health Inpatient Benefit**
- Per Day: $150
- Max Days: 60

**Accidental Death Benefit**
- Maximum Benefit: $10,000

**Critical Illness**

### Plan 500

**Hospital Confinement Benefit**
- Per Day: $500
- Max Days: 30

**Primary Care Doctors Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Specialty Care Doctors' Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $50
- Max Days: 5

**Emergency Room Benefit**
- Per Day: $50

**Mental Health Inpatient Benefit**
- Per Day: $250

**Accidental Death Benefit**

**Critical Illness**

### Plan 750

**Hospital Confinement Benefit**
- Per Day: $750
- Max Days: 30

**Primary Care Doctors Office Visit Benefit**

- Max Days: 5

**Specialty Care Doctors' Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $75
- Max Days: 5

**Emergency Room Benefit**
- Per Day: $75
- Max Days: 1

**Mental Health Inpatient Benefit**
- Per Day: $375
- Max Days: 60

**Accidental Death Benefit**

### Plan 1000

**Hospital Confinement Benefit**
- Per Day: $1000

**Primary Care Doctors Office Visit Benefit**
- Per Day: $75

- Max Days: 5

**Emergency Room Benefit**
- Per Day: $75
- Max Days: 1

**Critical Illness**

## Comparison of the Plans

| **Feature**                        | **100A** | **100** | **200** | **200+** | **300** | **500** | **750** | **1000** |
|------------------------------------|----------|---------|---------|----------|---------|---------|---------|----------|
| Hospital Confinement (Per Day)     | $100     | $100    | $200    | $200     | $300    | $500    | $750    | $1000    |
| Primary Care Visit (Per Day)       | $50      | $50     | $50     | $50      | $50     | $50     | $50     | $75      |
| Specialty Care Visit (Per Day)     | $50      | $50     | $50     | $50      | $50     | $50     | $75     | $100     |
| Emergency Room (Per Day)           | -        | -       | -       | $50      | $50     | $50     | $75     | $75      |
| Basic Pathology & Radiology (Per Day)| -      | -       | $50     | $50      | -       | $50     | $50     | $75      |
| Mental Health Inpatient (Per Day)  | -        | -       | -       | -        | $150    | $250    | $375    | $500     |
| Accidental Death Benefit           | -        | $10,000 | $10,000 | $10,000  | $10,000 | $10,000 | $10,000 | $10,000  |
| Critical Illness                   | -        | $1,000  | $1,000  | $1,000   | $1,000  | $1,000  | $1,000  | $1,000   |

## Limitations and Definitions

### Important Exclusions
- No coverage for services not deemed medically necessary or prescribed by a doctor.
- Excludes dental procedures, elective surgeries, and cosmetic treatments.
- Excludes injuries related to felonies, illegal activities, self-inflicted harm, and war.
- Pre-existing conditions are excluded for the first 12 months of coverage.

### Key Terms Defined
- **Hospital Confinement**: Coverage for each day of a hospital stay.
- **Primary/Specialty Care Visits**: Coverage for doctor visits, differentiated by general and specialized care.
- **Emergency Room**: Coverage for emergency medical treatment in a hospital ER.
- **Critical Illness**: Lump-sum benefit for diagnosis of specific illnesses.

## Key Takeaways

### Plan Highlights
- Advanced Wellness Plus offers tailored plans to fit various healthcare needs and financial capabilities.
- Comprehensive coverage across multiple areas of health, with flexibility in plan tiers.

### Value Propositions
- Provides essential health benefits with added support for mental health and critical illnesses.
- Membership in the NCE enhances access to valuable resources and support services.

### Next Steps
- Evaluate the specific healthcare needs and financial situation to select the most appropriate plan tier.
- Consider enrolling in the NCE for additional member benefits and services.
- Review the plan’s detailed terms and conditions to understand benefits and exclusions fully.
